data.instruction: Summarise the given paragraph in 2 sentences. Here one example is given below for your reference. Do not generate extra information just return summarise the given mailchain.

examples.input:
Input:
Hi Josh,
I would suggest a 1-hour call which will cover overview of the product features, which Andy can deliver. Please schedule the initial call, keeping in mind east coast time. We will discuss regular connects for feedback and/or queries after the initial meeting.

Kind regards,
Peter Joseph
Director, Product Engineering ABCLabs
E-mail: peter@abclabs.com


Thanks Peter,
Thanks for quick comeback. Are you going to schedule the initial call or do you want us to schedule it. Who should be invited ?
Do you plan to have a weekly/bi weekly call for feedback?

Regards,
Josh
examples.output: Josh wants to know who should be on the call, who will schedule it and at what frequency. Peter responded saying that we should have a 1 hour call with Ravi and we can have a regular connect.
